name: Luxy Charms
bio: Luxy Charms embodies the heart of the queer community’s resilience — the sparkle that never fades, even under pressure. Through compassion, performance, and power, he leads with empathy and strength, protecting his chosen family while daring the world to shine brighter.
notes: Luxy has mastered turning vulnerability into power. His strength comes from surviving hardship and finding family in his community. His connection to his four themes allows him to channel flamboyant energy, grounded loyalty, explosive joy, and authentic self-expression.

themes.identity: Never following the path — always blazing the trail.
themes.themeImprovement: When you Become Vulnerable using tags from this theme, gain +1 Juice.
tags: You don’t get to dull my sparkle

themes.identity: Protect the ones I love — my drag babies come first.
themes.themeImprovement: Spend 1 Juice to give an ally immunity to one move after dice are rolled.

themes.identity: My energy is contagious — my punches come with glitter.
themes.weakness: Sometimes my shine blinds me to danger.
themes.themeImprovement: When you Slay with two or more combo tags, deal 4 Power damage instead of 2.

themes.identity: Authenticity is my armor — performance is my weapon.
themes.weakness: When I doubt myself, the illusion cracks.
themes.themeImprovement: When you Strike a Pose using two or more combo tags, roll with +1 Power.
